Class BoundingAreaCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jspatial.BoundingAreaCheck

  • public final class BoundingAreaCheck
extends Object
    Overlap and containment checks between bounding areas.

                                      BoundingAreaType item)
        Parameters:
        container - The container
        item - The item that may or may not be contained
        Returns:

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(int a_x0,
                               int a_x1,
                               int a_y0,
                               int a_y1,
                               int b_x0,
                               int b_x1,
                               int b_y0,
                               int b_y1)
        The area a described by the given vertices contains b.
        Parameters:
        a_x0 - The X coordinate of the lower corner of a
        a_x1 - The X coordinate of the upper corner of a
        a_y0 - The Y coordinate of the lower corner of a
        a_y1 - The Y coordinate of the upper corner of a
        b_x0 - The X coordinate of the lower corner of b
        b_x1 - The X coordinate of the upper corner of b
        b_y0 - The Y coordinate of the lower corner of b
        b_y1 - The Y coordinate of the upper corner of b
        Returns:
        true if a contains b.

      • isWellFormed

        public static boolean isWellFormed(BoundingAreaType container)
        Parameters:
        container - The bounding area to examine.
        Returns:
        true iff the given bounding area is well formed. That is, iff container.boundingAreaLower().getXI() <= container.boundingAreaUpper().getXI() and container.boundingAreaLower().getYI() <= container.boundingAreaUpper().getYI() .

      • overlaps

        The area a described by the given vertices overlaps b.

        a_y0 - The Y coordinate of the lower corner of a
        a_y1 - The Y coordinate of the upper corner of a
        b_x0 - The X coordinate of the lower corner of b
        b_x1 - The X coordinate of the upper corner of b
        b_y0 - The Y coordinate of the lower corner of b
        b_y1 - The Y coordinate of the upper corner of b
        Returns:
        true if a overlaps b.

      • rayBoxIntersects

        public static boolean rayBoxIntersects(RayI2D ray,
                                       double x0,
                                       double y0,
                                       double x1,
                                       double y1)

        Branchless optimization of the Kay-Kajiya slab ray/AABB intersection test by Tavian Barnes.

        See tavianator.com.

        Parameters:
        ray - The ray.
        x0 - The lower X coordinate.
        x1 - The upper X coordinate.
        y0 - The lower Y coordinate.
        y1 - The upper Y coordinate.
        Returns:
        true if the ray is intersecting the box.
